value.name: End disenfranchisement of Bahamian Jehovah’s Witnesses
value.description: Dear Editor, According to JW.org, there are currently 1,795 Jehovah’s Witnesses (JWs) and 28 Kingdom Halls in The Bahamas. Worldwide, there are over eight million JWs in 240 countries.
